## Useful packages


## Data import

```{r}
dat <- read_csv("data/fastfood_nutrition_data.csv")
```


## Data analysis contract!


```{r test}
dat %>%
	group_by(Restaurant) %>%
	summarize(mean_cal = mean(Calories, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
	arrange(-mean_cal)
```
